name: Catarct
reason: A cataract is when the lens in the human eye slowly goes cloudy, this is usually linked to aging. The cloudiness causes blurring of vision which slowly worsens over time.
treatment: We are able to offer surgery to remove the cataract permanently. You will be assessed at an outpatient appointment and then should you wish to proceed with cataract surgery a surgery date will be fixed before you leave our unit.

name: Ocular trauma
reason: Ocular trauma, although not an everyday encounter for many ophthalmologists, is a serious problem for our eye health system.
treatment: In general, the more serious types of ocular trauma such as ruptured globes and corneal lacerations requiring surgical reconstruction are less frequently seen by most ophthalmologists.
surgery: Check visual acuity. Determine what is injured. Determine whether or not the globe has been ruptured.

name: Glaucoma Service
reason: Glaucoma is a condition associated with raised pressure within the eye, which gradually damages the delicate nerve of the eye. If this is left untreated it can cause permanent visual loss.
treatment: most patients will be treated with eye drops. Laser and Surgery will be given if necessary
